messages.msgSnippet: ... I m pretty sure I just saw Oregon Trail III in the discount bin at Staples for under $10. Life is good. ~Mary The miracle is not to walk on water. The
messages.messageBody:
>>My daughter loves Oregon Trail. We got Oregon Trail II from
>Amazon.com and Oregon Trail III from Staples. You might check at
>Price Club or Sams if you have one there. Sara>>

I'm pretty sure I just saw Oregon Trail III in the discount bin at Staples
for under $10.

Life is good.
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green
earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly alive."

~ Thich Nhat Hanh

----- Original Message -----
From: sarenafahn
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 08, 2003 12:09 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] looking for


Hi all,

Please Help? I am looking for the CD Rom of "Oregon Trail" Does anyone
have a extra copy or know where I can get my hands on this CD for my
son?

Thanks in advance

God Bless

Sarena

messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "sarenafahn"
<sarenafahn@y...> wrote:
> Hi all,
>
> Please Help? I am looking for the CD Rom of "Oregon Trail" Does
anyone
> have a extra copy or know where I can get my hands on this CD for
my
> son?
>
> Thanks in advance
>
> God Bless
>
> Sarena

My daughter loves Oregon Trail. We got Oregon Trail II from
Amazon.com and Oregon Trail III from Staples. You might check at
Price Club or Sams if you have one there. Sara

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] looking for
messages.msgSnippet: Go to: www.half.com and search in computers putting Oregon Trail in the search box. Lots of em there. Cheap. -pam
messages.messageBody:
Go to: www.half.com and search in "computers" putting Oregon Trail in
the search box. Lots of 'em there. Cheap.

-pam

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] looking for
messages.msgSnippet: You can e-mail NHOTIC_mail@or.blm.gov , call 541-523-1845, or write to Education Coordinator at National Historic Oregon Trail Interpretive Center, PO Box 987,
messages.messageBody:
You can e-mail NHOTIC_mail@... , call 541-523-1845, or write to Education Coordinator at National Historic Oregon Trail Interpretive Center,
PO Box 987, Baker City, OR 97814. The Resource Guide can be downloaded at http://www.or.blm.gov/NHOTIC/Education/teacher%20packets.htm
Hope this helps...
